title: San Diego/Balboa Park-Hillcrest
name: Museum of Photographic Arts
price: $8 adults, $7 seniors/veterans, $6 students, free for children under 12/active military (''theater admission separate'')
content: Dedicated to the art and history of photographic arts, with works from famous photographers such as Ansel Adams. The museum also holds changing exhibitions and a theater that plays art and cult films.
